Name: Celery
Description: Crisp and refreshing, it has little inherent taste on its own.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Crujiente y refrescante, tiene poco sabor inherente por sí mismo.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 신선한 맛이 나며, 그 자체로 고유의 맛은 거의 없습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Knackig und erfrischend, hat wenig Eigengeschmack.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 清々しく爽やかでいて、少し独特な味わい。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Crocante e refrescante, possui um sabor especial.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 清爽提神，本身就没有什么内在的味道。
